One way to use the themes is to copy the XAML file of the theme you would like to use into your project and in your App.xaml specify for example:
<Application.Resources>
        <ResourceDictionary Source="Themes/WhistlerBlue.xaml"></ResourceDictionary>
</Application.Resources>
There are probably other (better) solutions as well..
